title: Foster & Allen's Christmas collection
creator_credit: CMR Records, Quality Records and Bob Shipley
brief_description: Foster & Allen take us on a musical tour of Christmas with a selection of songs and carols. Interspersed with famous carols such as “We wish you a Merry Christmas”, “Jingle Bells”, “Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer” and the classic “Silent Night”, is a selection of their own favourites such as “Christmas time in Ireland” and “Silver Bells.” Hosted by Canadian Boyd Kozak, viewers are transported into a winter wonderland.
